Best Diabetes Tablets In India

Diabetes is a chronic condition that affects millions of people worldwide. In India, the prevalence of diabetes is on the rise, with an estimated 77 million people living with the disease. Managing diabetes requires a combination of lifestyle changes, including a healthy diet, regular exercise, and medication. One of the most common forms of medication for diabetes is tablets. In this blog post, we will discuss some of the best diabetes tablets available in India.

  1. Metformin: Metformin is one of the most commonly prescribed diabetes tablets in India. It is an oral medication that helps lower blood sugar levels by reducing the amount of glucose produced by the liver. Metformin is also known to improve insulin sensitivity, making it an effective treatment option for type 2 diabetes. It is generally well-tolerated and has few side effects, making it a popular choice among doctors and patients alike.

  2. Gliclazide: Gliclazide is another widely used diabetes tablet in India. It belongs to a class of medications called sulfonylureas, which work by stimulating the pancreas to produce more insulin. Gliclazide helps lower blood sugar levels and is particularly effective in controlling post-meal glucose spikes. It is available in various strengths and can be taken once or twice a day, depending on the individual's needs.

  3. Pioglitazone: Pioglitazone is a thiazolidinedione medication that helps improve insulin sensitivity and reduce insulin resistance. It is commonly prescribed for people with type 2 diabetes who are unable to control their blood sugar levels through lifestyle changes alone. Pioglitazone is available in tablet form and is usually taken once a day. It is important to note that this medication may have some side effects, including weight gain and fluid retention, so it should be used under the guidance of a healthcare professional.

  4. Dapagliflozin: Dapagliflozin is a relatively new class of medication called sodium-glucose co-transporter 2 (SGLT2) inhibitors. It works by blocking the reabsorption of glucose in the kidneys, leading to increased glucose excretion in the urine. Dapagliflozin helps lower blood sugar levels and has been shown to have additional benefits, such as weight loss and blood pressure reduction. It is usually taken once a day and can be used as a monotherapy or in combination with other diabetes medications.
